big-code-k8s-001.source: ground_truth_json (Manual analysis of taint effect propagation through K8s codebase: API types -> internal types -> validation -> scheduler plugin -> eviction controller -> endpoint controller. Cross-referenced with instruction.md requirements and partial-pass agent run analysis.)

big-code-servo-001.source: ground_truth_json (Instruction analysis of scrollend DOM event requirements. Traced scroll event handling through DOM event system (event.rs -> eventtarget.rs -> element.rs), window scroll handling, and compositor async scroll completion. No passing agent runs available for cross-validation.)

big-code-trt-001.source: ground_truth_json (Trajectory mining from 2 independent passing runs (baseline + SG_full, both reward=1.0). Common files modified across runs. W4A8_MXFP4_INT8 follows W4A8_MXFP4_FP8 pattern across Python enums, C++ enums, and kernel routing.)

big-code-vsc-001.source: ground_truth_json (Instruction analysis of stale diagnostics after git branch switch. Traced diagnostics pipeline from TypeScript language server client through extension host diagnostics API to Problems view. File watcher integration through VS Code file service. Cross-referenced with test.sh keyword checks.)

big-code-camel-arch-001.source: ground_truth_json (LLM-generated via Sourcegraph code search. Requires manual validation. Files identified by tracing the Component->Endpoint->Consumer->Processor->Producer hierarchy from API interfaces through base implementations to the routing engine (Pipeline, Channel, SendProcessor) and route reification.)

big-code-camel-feat-001.source: ground_truth_json (LLM-generated via Sourcegraph code search and GitHub API validation. Camel component pattern verified across camel-kafka and camel-netty reference implementations at camel-4.18.0. Requires manual validation.)

big-code-cross-capmarkets-arch-001.source: ground_truth_json (LLM-generated via Sourcegraph code search. Kafka files verified at 4.1.1 clients module, Flink files verified at release-2.2.0 (Source API in flink-core, connector-base framework, SourceOperator in flink-runtime). Kafka connector implementation lives in separate repo (apache/flink-connector-kafka); this ground truth covers the API contracts from both main repos. Requires manual validation.)

big-code-cross-k8s-arch-001.source: ground_truth_json (LLM-generated via Sourcegraph code search at v1.30.0. CRD lifecycle traced across four staging sub-projects (apimachinery, apiextensions-apiserver, client-go). All paths verified under staging/src/k8s.io/. Requires manual validation.)

big-code-django-arch-001.source: ground_truth_json (LLM-generated via Sourcegraph code search. Requires manual validation. Files identified by tracing the ORM pipeline from Manager.get_queryset() through QuerySet lazy evaluation, Query.get_compiler(), SQLCompiler.as_sql(), WhereNode/Expression/Lookup compilation, to execute_sql().)

big-code-django-bug-001.source: ground_truth_json (LLM-generated via Sourcegraph code search. Requires manual validation. Bug traced from Django ticket #36301: select_for_update(of) crashes when values_list() contains annotation expressions. Root cause in SQLCompiler.get_select() building klass_info['select_fields'] with incorrect range when Query.selected reorders columns. Fix commit: 71a19a0e475165dbc14c1fe02f552013ee670e4c.)

big-code-django-sec-001.source: ground_truth_json (LLM-generated via Sourcegraph code search. Requires manual validation. Files verified at django/django 5.2 (commit 9e7cc2b628fe8fd3895986af9b7fc9525034c1b0). CSRF/session pipeline traced from MiddlewareMixin.__call__() through CsrfViewMiddleware.process_view() and SessionMiddleware.process_response() to set_cookie().)

big-code-flink-arch-001.source: ground_truth_json (LLM-generated via Sourcegraph code search. Requires manual validation. Files identified by tracing the checkpoint lifecycle from CheckpointCoordinator.triggerCheckpoint() through barrier injection, barrier alignment (SingleCheckpointBarrierHandler), state snapshot (SubtaskCheckpointCoordinatorImpl), acknowledgment (AcknowledgeCheckpoint), to CompletedCheckpoint.)

big-code-flink-feat-001.source: ground_truth_json (LLM-generated via Sourcegraph code search at release-2.2.0. Windowing architecture confirmed: base classes in flink-runtime, concrete assigners in flink-streaming-java. EventTimeSessionWindows verified as primary pattern. Requires manual validation.)

big-code-k8s-arch-001.source: ground_truth_json (LLM-generated via Sourcegraph code search. Requires manual validation. Files identified by tracing the scheduling pipeline from Scheduler.Run() through ScheduleOne(), schedulingCycle(), bindingCycle(), and the plugin framework extension points.)

big-code-k8s-bug-001.source: ground_truth_json (LLM-generated via Sourcegraph code search. Requires manual validation. Bug traced from kubernetes/kubernetes PR #126807: DRA scheduler missing ResourceSlice event handler. Root cause: (1) dynamicresources.go EventsToRegister() omits ResourceSlice GVK, (2) eventhandlers.go addAllEventHandlers() has no case for ResourceSlice, (3) types.go missing ResourceSlice GVK constant. Fix commit: e85d3babf0ff3c010dd8bae9329a2465c2c46527.)

big-code-k8s-refac-001.source: ground_truth_json (LLM-generated via Sourcegraph code search (find_references on ScoreExtensions interface). Requires manual validation.)

big-code-kafka-bug-001.source: ground_truth_json (LLM-generated via Sourcegraph code search. Requires manual validation. Bug traced from KAFKA-19012: producer buffer pool reuse race condition causes messages on wrong topic. Root cause in Sender.failBatch() calling RecordAccumulator.deallocate() on in-flight batches, returning ByteBuffer to pool while NetworkClient still holds reference. Fix PR: apache/kafka#21065, commit 1df2ac5b2ba4d1b5ed54b895ff6fb9539303ccb5.)

big-code-kafka-refac-001.source: ground_truth_json (LLM-generated via Sourcegraph code search (find_references on RecordAccumulator class, keyword_search for import references). Validated against Sourcegraph-indexed mirror (Kafka ~3.1.x). BuiltInPartitioner and RecordAccumulatorFlushBenchmark are version-dependent (Kafka 3.3+/4.x). Requires manual validation against Kafka 4.1.1.)

big-code-kafka-sec-001.source: ground_truth_json (LLM-generated via Sourcegraph code search. Requires manual validation. Authentication flow traced from ChannelBuilders through SaslServerAuthenticator.authenticate() to Authorizer.authorize().)
